newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary forint ends steady vs basket, firms vs dlr.
newsitem.headline: Hungary forint ends steady vs basket, firms vs dlr.

text.p: Hungary's forint closed steady against the central bank basket on Friday and firmed against the dollar in routine trading, dealers said.

The forint remained at the National Bank of Hungary's (NBH) resistance level (bid) most of the day and finished at 183.45/50 against the dollar, compared with 184.10/12 at midday and 184.30/35 at opening.
The forint was some five pips weaker than the NBH bid in morning trade due to foreign currency buying but closed the gap by midday, traders said.
They added the Hungarian unit followed a hectic dollar/mark troughout the afternoon session.
